Room.Name: Evenborough Way/Darmanian Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Darmanian Way and Evenborough Way.
Room.LongDescription: Evenborough Way runs north and south through the northern part of town. Looking to the north, you can see the northern entrance to the city of Oceancrest. There are a number of small shops on the southwestern corner of this intersection, and the Evenborough Stables and Inn located off of the northeastern and northwestern corners respectively.
